bustercross365: Malice:  The hunter picks the crying femme up and 
walks back to the ship and where they left the blanket.
Blacknightmare: the femme continued tembling and the tears still 
were rolled down 
Malice:  He sat in the floor with her in his arms still, and covered 
them both with the blanket.  "I'm so sorry..."
BlackNightmare: "You're not... I should ask forgiveness"
Malice:  "I don't want to know!  If it hurt you so much, then just 
forget it!  Don't tell me!"
BlackNightmare: "I never have escaped... and it the only thing that 
I was doing since this torture you, avoinding the facts... I don't 
want run anynore... "
Malice:  "No more!  Just forget it!  Let's just start over, forget 
the whole thing."  
BlackNightmare: "If you wish... but you should know something: You 
have a sister..."
Malice:  "Huh?  What?  How is that possible?  I have a sister?  
Where is she?  Who is she?
BlackNightnmare: "In the battle in the cannon against Maximals, I 
was fightting against a femme, you may remember her... Cybervemmon 
was knoking me off and you came to help me... you acted fast, you 
didn't  gave me chance to stopped you... She's your sister... she 
told me that... she has the same skills than you... I don't know her 
name... I just know that she's a Maximal..."
BlackNightnmare: "In the battle in the cannon against Maximals, I 
was fightting against a femme, you may remember her... Cybervemmon 
was knoking me off and you came to help me... you acted fast, you 
didn't  gave me chance to stopped you... She's your sister... she 
told me that... she has the same skills than you... I don't know her 
name... I just know that she's a Maximal..."
Malice:  He thinks for a moment, back to the battle, vaguely 
remembering the femme in question.  "She was my sister...?"
BlackNightmare: "She's... Maximals never lies...."
Malice:  "So why don't I know her, why can't iremember her?
BlackNightmare: "'cause..." the tears appeared in he eyes "'cause... 
we..., Hellplague and I erased your memories... You had been 
captured in a battle against Maximals, with Unicron's permission you 
has been reprogramed and your memories erased  in order to serve 
us... and serve him... Now you know all, I could understand that you 
hate me... if you desire kill me... I  don't care... I don't care 
anything..."
Malice:  "No!  That can't be right!  Then why don't I see that when 
I run a system check!  I don't find anything wrong, if what you say 
is true, then Hellplague will have to deprogram it.  I will not lose 
you!  No, not ever!
BlackNightmare: "It's true"said the femme sadly and bitterly while 
she rested her head in Malice's shoulder"All it's the true... and I 
was agree... with all... I didn't fell in love for any one and I 
that time I didn't care what I was doing, but, you... I I fell in 
love..."
